title: Crime Alert 04.30.19
itunes:title: Crime Alert 04.30.19
description:
Judge sentences a Georgia man to straight probation after keeping teen girl captive for over a year. 65 people busted in a massive drug sting. Mom and aunt of autistic boy booked on suspicion of murder.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
